title.narrative: Evaluation, Quality Assurance and Learning Service EQuALS (formerly Specialist Evaluation and Quality Assurance Services)

description.narrative: The consortium is delivering a range of core evaluation and monitoring specialised services to assist the DFID’s embedding evaluation agenda. These specialist services are also available to build capacity in DFID’s partner development countries. DFID is working towards raising the standard on evaluation and supports users of evaluation located within partner developing country national governments, the not-for-profit sector and the private sector to promote better quality evaluation.
